# 快消行业消费者运营解决方案

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/kuaixiao-xingye-xiaofeizhe-yunying-jiejuefangan
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/kuaixiao-xingye-xiaofeizhe-yunying-jiejuefangan
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install kuaixiao-xingye-xiaofeizhe-yunying-jiejuefangan
kuaixiao-xingye-xiaofeizhe-yunying-jiejuefangan <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g kuaixiao-xingye-xiaofeizhe-yunying-jiejuefangan
kuaixiao-xingye-xiaofeizhe-yunying-jiejuefangan <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
